Avtomobillarning orqa yon oynasiga parda taqish masalasiga Oliy sudda tashkil etilgan ishchi guruh nuqta qo‘yadi

01 Nov 2019, 20:10

Yo‘l harakati xavfsizligi inspektorlari va haydovchilar o‘rtasida tortishuvlarga sabab bo‘layotgan avtomobillarning orqa yon oynasiga parda taqish masalasini Oliy sudda tashkil etilgan ishchi guruh o‘rganib chiqadi. Bu haqda 31-oktabr, payshanba kuni IIV Yo‘l harakati xavfsizligi bosh boshqarmasi boshlig‘i o‘rinbosari, polkovnik Erali Bozorov jurnalistlar bilan bo‘lib o‘tgan ochiq muloqotda ta’kidlab o‘tdi, deya xabar bermoqda “Daryo” muxbiri Musulmonbek Ibrohimov.


Polkovnik Erali Bozorov.Foto: Axborot va ommaviy kommunikatsiyalar agentligi

Avvalroq Buxoro shahar ma’muriy sudi avtomobillarning orqa yon oynasiga parda taqish masalasida haydovchi foydasiga qaror chiqargan edi. Sud qaroridan norozi bo‘lgan Buxoro IIV YHHB viloyat ma’muriy sudida bo‘lib o‘tgan kassatsiya tartibidagi majlisda o‘z vajlarini isbotlab bera olmagan va yutqazgan. Xuddi shu kabi masala yuzasidan Farg‘onaning Toshloq ma’muriy sudi va Samarqand shahar ma’muriy sudi ham haydovchilarga solingan jarimalarni bekor qilish haqida qarorlar chiqargan.
Shundan so‘ng IIV avtomobil orqa yon oynalariga parda tutuvchi normani qonunchilikka aniq-tiniq kiritishni nazarda tutuvchi hujjat loyihasini jamoatchilik muhokamasi taqdim etgan edi. Bu holatni, jumladan, Oliy Majlis Qonuchilik palatasi deputati Rasul Kusherboyev shunday baholagan edi: “Biz haqmiz, degan da’vosi aslida noto‘g‘ri bo‘lib, endi so‘zda sobit turish uchun qaysarlik bilan qonunni o‘zgartirishmoqchi”.
31-oktabr kuni bo‘lib o‘tgan ochiq muloqotda “Daryo” muxbiri mashinalarning orqa yon eshiklariga parda o‘rnatish masalasidagi tushunmovchiliklarga qachon nuqta qo‘yilishi haqida savol bilan IIV mutasaddilariga murojaat qildi. Bunga javoban polkovnik Erali Bozorov parda mojarosiga yakuniy nuqta qo‘yadigan ishchi guruh tashkil etilganini ma’lum qildi.
Bu masala bo‘yicha uch-to‘rt oydan buyon shug‘ullunib kelyapmiz. Kuni kecha Oliy Sudda IIV, Bosh prokuratura, “O‘zstandart” va Moliya vazirligi mutaxassislari ishtirokida avtomobillarning orqa yon oynasiga parda taqish masalasi muhokama qilindi va mutasaddi tashkilotlar ishtirokida ishchi guruh tuzishga qaror qilindi.Ishchi guruhga ushbu muammoli vaziyatni o‘rganib chiqish va ishni oxiriga yetkazish topshirig‘i berildi. Yakuniy xulosa bo‘yicha yana qo‘shimcha axborot beramiz.Erali Bozorov, IIV YHXBB boshlig‘i o‘rinbosari, polkovnik
Mavzuga doir: “YPX xodimini videoga olib, internetga chiqarib yuborish o‘zbekchilikka to‘g‘ri kelmaydi”. IIV “videochi”-haydovchilarni o‘zaro hurmatga chaqirdi O‘zbekistonda avtomobillarning shovqinini o‘lchaydigan moslama yo‘q. Shu bois sershovqin mashinalar jarimaga tortilmayapti

The Supreme Court's working group puts a curtain on the rear window of cars

01 Nov 2019, 20:10

The Supreme Court will investigate the issue of covering the rear window of controversial vehicles between traffic inspectors and drivers. This was stated on Thursday, October 31 by the Deputy Chief of the Main Department of Road Safety of the Interior Ministry, Colonel Erali Bozorov, in an open conversation with journalists, the correspondent of the river "Muslim" reports. Ibrahimov.


Colonel Erali Bozorov.Foto: Information and Mass Communications Agency

Earlier, the Bukhara City Administrative Court ruled in favor of the driver in covering the rear window of the car. The Bukhara Interior Ministry's Internal Affairs Department, which was dissatisfied with the court's ruling, failed to prove its motives and failed at a cassation session in the regional administrative court. On the same issue, Ferghana's Tashlak Administrative Court and the Samarkand City Administrative Court also ruled to abolish driver fines.
The Ministry of Internal Affairs has since presented a draft document to the legislature to explicitly introduce the curtain on the rear windows. Rasul Kusherboyev, a member of the Parliament's House of Representatives, assessed the situation, saying: "The claim that we are right was wrong, and now wants to change the law in order to stay true to the word."
In an open conversation on Oct. 31, a river reporter asked MIA officials about the timing of misunderstandings regarding the installation of curtains on the rear doors. In response, Colonel Erali Bozorov said a working group was set up to end the curtain conflict.
We have been working on this issue for three or four months. The Supreme Court discussed the issue of wearing a rearview mirror with experts from the Interior Ministry, the Prosecutor General's Office, Uzstandard and the Ministry of Finance and decided to set up a working group with relevant organizations. delivery order. We will provide further information on the final conclusion. Eraly Bozorov, Deputy Chief of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, Colonel
